sponsor: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)
briefTitle: Cysteamine Bitartrate Delayed-Release for the Treatment of NAFLD in Children
officialTitle: Cysteamine Bitartrate Delayed-Release for the Treatment of Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD) in Children (CyNCh)
summary: CyNCh is a multi-center, placebo-controlled clinical trial of children ages 8 to 17 years with biopsy-confirmed moderate to severe nonalcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD). The primary objective is to evaluate whether 52 weeks of treatment with cysteamine bitartrate delayed-release capsules will result in improvement in liver disease severity.

primaryOutcome.measure: Improvement in Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD)
